text: Nikola Kalinic (born January 21, 1997) is a professional Canadian football fullback for the Hamilton Tiger-Cats of the Canadian Football League (CFL). He played U Sports football for the York Lions from 2015 to 2018. Kalinic is of Serbian descent. ==Professional career== Kalinic was drafted in the second round, tenth overall by the Tiger-Cats in the 2019 CFL Draft and he signed with the team on May 17, 2019. After making the team following training camp, he played in his first professional game on June 13, 2019 against the Saskatchewan Roughriders. In his second game, on June 22, 2019 against the Toronto Argonauts, he scored his first career CFL touchdown on his first career reception on a 31-yard pass from Jeremiah Masoli. ==References== ==External links== * Hamilton Tiger-Cats bio * York Lions bio Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Canadian football fullbacks Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:York Lions football players Category:Players of Canadian football from Ontario Category:Canadian people of Serbian descent
title: Nikola Kalinic (Canadian football)
